name: comp_p10
formal_statement: theorem comp_p10 (a b d : ℝ) ( ha : a > 0 ) ( hb : b > 0 ) ( hd : d > 0 ) : min ((2 * ((Real.exp a) - 1) + ((Real.exp b) - 1)) / 3) ((2:ℝ)/3 * (Real.log (d+1))^6 + (1:ℝ)/3 * a^6) + (4:ℝ)/7 * a^7 + (3:ℝ)/7 * b^7 ≥ a^4 * b^3 + min ((Real.log (d+1))^4 * a^2) ((((Real.exp a) - 1) * ((Real.exp a) - 1) * ((Real.exp b) - 1)) ^ (3⁻¹: ℝ)) := by
